featured.text: After spending most of her salary on rent and food, Amelia _____ had any money left for entertainment and other expenses.

definition.zh_def: 阿梅莉亞，一個女性名字，源自拉丁語，意指勤奮或努力。
definition.en_def: Amelia is a female given name of Latin origin, meaning industrious or striving.
definition.example: Amelia loves to read books in her free time.
